nodes.text: Simlish was a language. It was spoken by residents of Black Spire Outpost, on Batuu, around the time of the Cold War. Rey Skywalker and Kylo Ren were also fluent in it, with characteristic accents.
Here are some sentences in Simlish, followed by their translation into Galactic Basic Standard.
Simlish is the fictional language used in the The Sims game franchise.
